title: I rather lane vs a Darius as any champ than too lane vs a Tham Kench
body:
I want to farm without getting my HP taken away with a huge slow on low cd, good luck having a melee champ vs that without somehow your hp getting down a square every aa of his.

Still, don't understand why he hasn't gotten nerfed

replies.body: Because rito thinks tahm is fine, even though he has no bad matchups, even against ranged champs like Neeko or kennen, he's broken to the piont, for 21 games straight, I have banned him, he is without counterplay or balance.
